title: was at 100% in loading game gave me as leaver.
body:
I had everyone at 100% in loading and was sitting there for a bit so I exited and reloaded once again getting to 100% having everyone but one OTHER player at 100% my noc was at 0%. Sat for a bit waiting for something to happen. After a bit I exit to reload except instead it takes me to end game screen I was labeled the leaver and lost 17 Lp. 

Super not cool. No idea what prevented me from getting in since this was game number 10ish for me today and had no issues in my other games. 

What info do you need from me to look into this in detail? I have seen this sort of thing happen once before recently ( I had quit out then and reloaded and actually got into the game that time).

replies.body: Just happened to me again, now I have 20 min leavers buster.  When I didn't leave, zero internet issues, been a couple months of this... when are you going to fix it?
and it took away my lp. such bs
